name: Fakespot, Inc.
description: Developer of an online data authentication platform designed to prevent fake and misleading content from deceiving consumers. The company's application software analyzes product reviews and provides potential buyers with a grade based on the authenticity of the review, enabling consumers to detect fake reviews on Amazon, TripAdvisor, Yelp and the Apple App Store.
